name: places/ChIJh-UZ-XVZwokR6SNzMkXNHuo
adrFormatAddress: 220 1st Ave., New York, NY 10009, USA

editorialSummary.text: Veteran neighborhood source for tools, paint, plumbing & electrical supplies, plus related services.

originalText.text: I regret shopping here. I wanted to support local business - made two trips for lightbulbs, and neither worked as expected. They’re also ~4x more expensive than what you’d find on Amazon. When you try to make a return, they give you an archaic ‘credit slip’ to spend money at their store, instead of refunding your card. Giving 3 stars (instead of 2) because at least one of the workers tried to be helpful.

text.text: I regret shopping here. I wanted to support local business - made two trips for lightbulbs, and neither worked as expected. They’re also ~4x more expensive than what you’d find on Amazon. When you try to make a return, they give you an archaic ‘credit slip’ to spend money at their store, instead of refunding your card. Giving 3 stars (instead of 2) because at least one of the workers tried to be helpful.

originalText.text: Surprised to read some of the earlier reviews as the guys working in the store today, when I went in, were polite and helpful--practically to a fault. As I was leaving, I got some interesting trivia regarding the business. A fire long ago (started in a neighboring basement, apparently) was quite a blow, but not one they couldn't weather--as told engagingly by one of the managers. What's more, they've been open for nearly a century in this East Village spot. That's undeniably saying good about the place, besides my review. Longevity speaks. Definitely a pleasant chat. And yes, prices are a bit high.

originalText.text: Best service out there. Howie was very helpful and made me feel welcomed in his store. I came all the way from LI to go to his store because of a recommendation from Uncle Ted!

text.text: Best service out there. Howie was very helpful and made me feel welcomed in his store. I came all the way from LI to go to his store because of a recommendation from Uncle Ted!

originalText.text:
Hands down the #1 hardware store in the neighborhood.  Whether it's paint, plumbing,
electrical or household supplies that you need,
they have it all.  Sid and Howie offer the best customer service and with a smile too..great guys!

electrical or household supplies that you need,
they have it all.  Sid and Howie offer the best customer service and with a smile too..great guys!

originalText.text: It's a hardware store. Everyone on here looking for a smile and a muffin go across the street to the Starbucks. You need to fix something at home that's broken, or buy a need piece, then yes. By all means yes. This is a hardware store. They have solid advice and won't lead you wrong. Hence, one job was far too out of my technical reach, they said hell no hire a professional.
